summary: Changes skooma to have Fallout 3/ New Vegas style addiction.
descriptionHtml: Skooma has a chance of addiction when using it. Skooma withdrawal causes -30% stamina regen rate. Use more skooma to alleviate this. Staying sober for 1 in-game day removes addiction (this will likely be changed and is currently 1 in-game day because it was easier to test). Skooma now increases stamina regen rate by 50% for 3 minutes and increases stamina by 5 for 7 minutes instead of restoring stamina so it is no longer a minor stamina potion.
author: Reptilian
